title: The Wiser Adviser feat. Elaine Hendrix, Devyn McDowell, Mark Pellegrino
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Elaine Hendrix (Dynasty, The Parent Trap), Mark Pellegrino (Supernatural, American Rust), and Devyn McDowell (Annette, The Good Nurse) star in this Jewish and Persian tale about how fortune can change in the blink of an eye.
